CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1945, pg. 4, reads: "We'll Soon Drive These - Edward F. Kram, secretary-treasurer of the Yellow Cab Company, announced this week that Negro drivers will be hired by the taxi firm as soon as they can get priorities for new equipment - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Four Checker Model A Yellow Cab Company taxicabs parked on a wooden plank ramp next to industrial building
